author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FLOODING RAINS FROM ERNESTO CONTINUE ACROSS PUERTO RICO AND THE  VIRGIN ISLANDS...
summary:
...FLOODING RAINS FROM ERNESTO CONTINUE ACROSS PUERTO RICO AND THE  VIRGIN ISLANDS...
 As of 8:00 AM AST Wed Aug 14
 the center of Ernesto was located near 19.8, -67.2
 with movement NW at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 991 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Ernesto (AT5/AL052024)
